snippet.title: Penny Larceny: Gig Economy Supervillain - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A comic book adventure of freelance supervillainy, petting cats, and/or destroying capitalism in which your choices determine success in a series of daring heists and capers. Coming in 2023 to Windows, Mac, and Linux from Fiction Factory Games.

Steam Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2227030/Penny_Larceny_Gig_Economy_Supervillain/

Itchio: https://fictionfactorygames.itch.io/penny-larceny

- Written by Stefan Gagne
- Character Art by Sam "Crowbar" Henry
- "Back of the House" by Alice Knows Karate
- Music Composition by Star (Slide20XX) http://slide20xx.com/
